channel.title: Adding a Custom Crown {ALREADY 90% DONE-JUST NEED HELP WITH A CODE}

item.title: Adding a Custom Crown {ALREADY 90% DONE-JUST NEED HELP WITH A CODE}
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Okay so I’ve been trying to add custom crowns for only certain people on my server. I tried adding player rights, coming up with a code to directly give someone and crown, and many other methods. Then it hit me. Why not use the donator status method? Since only donators get the donator crown? And so I began to code.

I coded everything in the server for the code but I’m stuck on the code with the client.
Here’s my donator codes:

Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.javaClient.java Code:

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[15] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("iconh33");

Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java Code:

if(s.startsWith("iconh33")) { try { anInt1440 = 25; anInt1441 = 16; Image image48 = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Spirts/dones.png"); anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber48 = new PixelGrabber(image48, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber48.grabPixels(); } catch(Exception exception48) { System.out.println(exception48); }

I tried using that code and only changing the names of the code and it didn’t work. This is what I have for the customcrown code I’m making: (I figured it didn’t matter what the name of the file was, so I named the .png file ‘shadowicon’ and I put that in here.)

Client.java Code:

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[15] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("shadowicon");

Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java Code:

if(s.startsWith("shadowicon")) { try { anInt1440 = 25; anInt1441 = 16; Image image48 = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Files/Spirts/shadowicon.png"); anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441]; PixelGrabber pixelgrabber48 = new PixelGrabber(image48, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440); pixelgrabber48.grabPixels(); } catch(Exception exception48) { System.out.println(exception48); }

What should I change to make the crown work? =\
